categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Imperial Squadron Five of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing was tasked by Colonel Shakara Nuress with a mission to keep the disabled Star Destroyer Celerity from falling into enemy hands.
The mission to the Kudo system first appeared in the first issue of Star Wars: TIE Fighter that was released on April 17, 2019.
